column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 11 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Greendale Rd is shutdown to thru traffic between Leestown Rd and Mercer Rd until further notice.  A semi is on its side and must be offloaded.
Motorists may use Westhampton Dr or Citation Blvd to access Mercer Rd from Leestown Rd.
